("data protection is important, but why do we have to hear about it all the time? why can't companies and governments simply respect our privacy? #dataprivacy #respectourprivacy")

this post critiques the fact that data privacy is a recurring topic, implying that it should be a given that personal information is protected, rather than something that needs to be constantly discussed. the hashtags #dataprivacy and #respectourprivacy are used to reach a wider audience and to connect the post to ongoing conversations around data privacy. the use of the german language and the casual tone reflect the style of twitter and the way users typically communicate on the platform.
